name: expansively
content:
expansively adverb
(FRIENDLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you talk expansively, you happily talk to people in a friendly way: He talks expansively about his work. Our host greeted us expansively.
More examplesFewer examplesThe director thanked everyone expansively for their hard work on the show. She talks expansively about the beauty and wonder of her desert home.He has the knack of talking expansively without actually giving much away.
